title: 18 Minutes of College Football 26 Gameplay

author: IGN
description: It's time to return to the Borderland... In the previous season, Arisu and Usagi cleared every card's game and returned to the real world. Now married, they lead a happy life, though their memories of the Borderland surface only in dreams and hallucinations. One day, Usagi suddenly vanishes. Guided by Ryuji, a man who studies the afterlife, she sets out for the Borderland. A devastated Arisu is visited by Banda, now a Borderland resident, who informs him of Usagi’s whereabouts. Arisu must now follow her back into inevitable danger to find her. Upon his return, Arisu faces a barrage of fire arrows and electric currents powerful enough to fry victims alive. Will he find Usagi and return to their world? What awaits them and the other players — hope or despair? With only the Joker card remaining, the game it holds for Arisu and the others remains a mystery. The Borderland returns on an even grander scale, with stunning visuals that will captivate viewers.
title: Alice in Borderlands Season 3 - Official Teaser Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Magic: The Gathering trailer for the card game's first space opera set, Edge of Eternities. With Edge of Eternities, as you warp through the system, look out for militant factions fighting over the fate of the system’s star—the Supervoid itself. In Edge of Eternities, you'll discover brand-new space fantasy mechanics, dazzling card treatments, and powerful artifacts scattered across the stars. The horizon is only the beginning. Magic: The Gathering's Edge of Eternities will be available in stores everywhere August 1, 2025. You can play early at your local game store starting July 25, and it will be available on MTG Arena on August 14, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #MTG
title: Magic: The Gathering: Edge of Eternities - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Superman (2025), reviewed by Tom Jorgensen.

Superman is a wonderfully entertaining, heartfelt cinematic reset for the Man of Steel, and a great new start for the DC universe on the big screen. David Corenswet is a natural, benevolent Superman, Nicholas Hoult’s egomaniacal Lex Luthor gives him the perfect foil, and by minute two, you’ll be willing to burn a thousand Kryptons if it means saving Supes’ chaotic, good-boy companion Krypto the Superdog. Director and DCU maestro James Gunn throws a lot at us here and trusts that decades of practice watching superhero movies will carry us through any storytelling corners he’s cutting in favor of keeping the pace brisk and the fun abundant. It’s a dense and at times overwhelming adventure, but it feels like the right one for the moment.

#IGN #Movies #Superman
title: Superman Review

author: IGN
description:
We’ve all heard the spiel about Superman before. He’s faster than a speeding bullet, more powerful than a locomotive, and able to leap tall buildings in a single bound. In short, he’s one of the most powerful fictional characters ever conceived, able to break the laws of physics and bend time itself with impunity.

That said, Superman’s powers are nothing if not evolving. They’ve ebbed and flowed a lot over the decades, with the character evolving from super-strong defender of the downtrodden to all-powerful, godlike superhero to the more well-rounded character he is today. The only constant with Superman is his inconsistency.

With actor David Corenswet introducing moviegoers to the latest cinematic incarnation of the Man of Steel, let’s take a step back to examine how Superman’s powers have evolved and changed over the years, from the earliest Superman comics to the campy excesses of the Silver Age and right on into the modern era.

Superman is directed by James Gunn and stars David
title: The Utterly Bizarre History of Superman's Powers

author: IGN
description:
Arknights: RISE FROM EMBER is available now on Crunchyroll!

As a terminal disease that crystallizes its victims spreads, Rhodes Island Pharmaceuticals Inc. races to find a cure while trying to quell the Reunion Movement. After a devastating fight with Skullshatterer, Amiya mourns her failure to save Misha. Meanwhile, Rhodes investigates an abandoned city near Lungmen and uncovers a disturbing new threat…
title: Arknights: RISE FROM EMBER - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'I Herald Galactus' Clip from the upcoming The Fantastic Four: First Steps, the upcoming installment in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, and the introduction to Marvel's first family in the MCU. Hear the calls from the Silver Surfer as Galactus looms closer and closer, leaving The Fantastic Four in a dire situation to save their planet. The Fantastic Four: First Steps is in theaters on July 25.

The Fantastic Four: First Steps stars Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby, Joseph Quinn, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ralph Ineson, and Julia Garner. The Fantastic Four: First Steps opens in theaters on July 25, 2025.

Set against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro- futuristic world, Marvel Studios’ The Fantastic Four: First Steps introduces Marvel’s First Family—Reed Richards/Mister Fantastic (Pedro Pascal), Sue Storm/Invisible Woman (Vanessa Kirby), Johnny Storm/Human Torch (Joseph Quinn) and Ben Grimm/The Thing (Ebon Moss-Bachrach) as they face their most daunting challenge yet. Fo
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps - Official 'Herald Galactus' Clip (2025) Julia Garner, Pedro Pascal

author: IGN
description: Check out the Lokiceratops Dinosaur Showcase Trailer for Jurassic World Evolution 3, a dinosaur park simulation management game developed by Frontier Developments. Players can get acquainted with the Lokiceratops, a dinosaur with distinctive curved horns, a colorful frill, and a huge size. Create a safe environment for the Lokiceratops in Jurassic World Evolution 3 on October 21 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3 - Official Lokiceratops Dinosaur Showcase Trailer

author: IGN
description:
See the monsters, gameplay, and dark fantasy world of Empire Patron in this trailer for the upcoming open-world RPG. Empire Patron is coming to Early Access on PC.

Lead the main hero in his journey to become an Empire Patron to collect artifacts to gain power over other nations and races by building a reputation and armies, explore a dark fantasy open-world RPG with combat and magic.

Join five nations in a world where the hero's journey begins as a human but can take many unexpected turns. Step onto infected biomass and transform into a monster. Die and be reborn as a demon. Return to life once more as a human if you return souls to the underground world as a demon. Harness ancient artifacts to evolve into a mystical being. And ultimately, uncover the true identity of the enigmatic Indefinite Nation.
title: Empire Patron - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out The Walking Dead collaboration Announcement Trailer for Dead by Daylight, the asymmetrical multiplayer horror game developed by Behaviour Interactive. Players can experience a brand-new Chapter inspired by the hit television series, AMC’s The Walking Dead. Both Rick Grimes and Michonne join the game as survivors with a Legendary Outfit from The Walking Dead Collection that brings Daryl Dixon into the action. The Walking Dead Chapter for Dead by Daylight is releasing on July 29 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).
title: Dead by Daylight x The Walking Dead - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Coming Soon in 2025' Trailer for Disney Plus, the hit streaming service for Disney IP. Get a special look at what's in store for viewers for the rest of 2025, including Marvel Television's Wonder Man, FX's Alien Earth, Percy Jackson and the Olympians, and more streaming exclusively on Disney+.

#WonderMan #MCU #DisneyPlus
title: Disney Plus - Official 'Coming Soon in 2025' Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description: Check out a new stage of gameplay and then a boss fight with the newly revealed Kumori from Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound, the upcoming 2D throwback to the roots of the famous franchise. Ragebound will be released on July 31 for PC (via Steam), PlayStation platforms, Xbox platforms, and Nintendo Switch. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2542120/NINJA_GAIDEN_Ragebound/
title: Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound – New Stage and Boss Fight Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Set in present-day Los Angeles, Descendent follows Sean Bruner, a school security guard who is haunted by childhood trauma while preparing for the birth of his first child with his wife, Andrea. After a beam of light appears in the sky during a late-night shift, Sean wakes up in the hospital with an inexplicable talent for vivid, unsettling drawings of extraterrestrials and desert landscapes. 

As his visions blur the line between dreams and reality, Sean’s grip on sanity unravels. With time running out, he must confront his fears to escape his family’s tragic legacy.

Ross Marquand and Sarah Bolger star in the sci-fi thriller written and directed by Peter Cilella. 

Descendent opens in limited theatrical release on August 8, 2025 and nationwide and VOD on August 15, 2025.
title: Descendent - Exclusive Trailer (2025) Ross Marquand, Sarah Bolger

author: IGN
description: Meet the Kress siblings, Otto and Arora, twins conjoined at birth due to their in utero exposure to toxic chemicals, in this brutal new The Outlast Trials trailer. The latest The Outlast Trials trailer introduces this new Prime Asset coming to Season 4: Project Diarchy, as you learn more about the conjoined twins who have a complete 360-degree field of vision and the weapons they wield. The Outlast Trials Season 4: Project Diarchy will also feature a new environment, a new Trial, and MK-Challenges, as well as the reintroduction of the Rebirth system, now with added options for team play. Season 4 of The Outlast Trials arrives on PC (Steam and Epic Games Store), Xbox Series S/X, Xbox One, PlayStation 4 (PS4), and PlayStation 5 (PS5) on July 15, 2025.
title: The Outlast Trials: Project Diarchy - Official New Prime Asset Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Exclusive Combat Gameplay Trailer for Under a Rock, an upcoming open-world survival crafting game developed by Nordic Trolls. Players will explore a procedurally generated open world manifested by alternate evolutionary timelines as groups of up to 10 players venture out into the unknown to build bases, tame creatures, and survive the vibrant sandbox. Check out the latest trailer get a glimpse at gameplay from Under a Rock featuring ranged attacks, up-close encounters, and intense dodging. Under a Rock is coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Under a Rock - Exclusive Combat Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
As expected, layoffs at Microsoft and Xbox did happen this week, and they were unbelievably brutal. Approximately 9,000 people reportedly got laid off, multiple games were canceled, and entire studios were shut down.  What does this mean for the future of Xbox? We sort through the damage, discuss the human impact, and debate what’s next for the platform heading into 2026. Plus, how did we get here, and can Xbox bounce back?

For all the latest news and discussion around the always-busy and always-changing world of Xbox, be sure to check out Unlocked. It’s IGN’s weekly Xbox show, hosted by Ryan McCaffrey, Miranda Sanchez, and Michael Higham. New episodes of Unlocked drop every Thursday on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever you get your shows, with full video versions on IGN.com and YouTube. Unlocked is produced by IGN, and part of the Geek Media podcast network.
title: The Fallout of Xbox’s Massive Layoffs - Unlocked Clips

author: IGN
description: Take a look at gameplay from Vaultbreakers in this new trailer for the upcoming top-down high-stakes adventure action RPG. In Vaultbreakers, fight challenging bosses in heroic brawler combat. Explore a dynamic world that reacts to your actions. Reclaim lost relics and escape! Play solo or with friends in savage PvE & PvPvE modes. Vaultbreakers will be available on PC, and a Playtest is available until July 9, 2025.
title: Vaultbreakers - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: On today's Daily Fix, the founder of Akane Studios, creators of Dishonored and Prey, and the now President at Weird West developer, WolfEye Studio called Xbox Game Pass unsustainable in a thread of posts on social media where a debate over the pros and cons of Microsoft’s Xbox Game Pass for gamers and developers ensued. Other devs like, Joe Kainer, former VP of Biz Dev Epic Games and Michael Douse, publishing director at Baldur’s Gate 3 developer, Larian Studios also joined the conversation to back him up.
title: Arkane Studios Founder Takes Shots at Microsoft’s Xbox Game Pass - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Solo Leveling: Karma reveal trailer for the upcoming roguelite action RPG that expands upon the universe of the Solo Leveling anime series. The Solo Leveling: Karma trailer shows combat against formidable Magic Beasts, featuring The Gatekeeper of Hell Ceberus, Hobgoblin Leader, Avaricious Vulcan, The Demonic King Baran, and the Godlike Statue of Cartenon Temple. Solo Leveling: Karma will be available on PC and mobile

Solo Leveling: Karma introduces an original storyline set in the Dimensional Gap — an unexplored narrative window within the source material — where protagonist Sung Jinwoo endures a 27-year-long war among Monarchs. At the heart of this epic is the "Broken Cup of Reincarnation," an artifact that can only be restored through Jinwoo’s fragmented memories.
title: Solo Leveling: Karma - Official Reveal Trailer
